text:
Chellappan (65) of Melakalunkadi Colony here was knocked down

by a speeding bike ridden by an engineering student near Putheri flyover on Sunday evening. Chellappan succumbed

to his injuries at Kanyakumari

Government Medical College Hospital on Monday evening. The student, Vasudev (21) of Putheri, was arrested by Traffic Investigation

Wing on Monday.

A case has been registered.
title: Man dies in accident
